content: Hi Is the source code for the document https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathematics_in_lean/mathematics_in_lean.pdf, for example, some markdown files or reStructuredText files publicly available? I don’t see it in the repo. Sometimes running a lean environment from ssh console (namely emacs in terminal)it’s helpful to have some text only version document

The PDF is built from the same sources.

make latex
make latexpdf
Thank you very much Richard and Patrick. Yeah the source repo contains the documents also in the lean source files :tada:
Coriver Chen has marked this topic as resolved.
